name: Dice Knight (ReyGameDev)
description:
Dice Knight is a 2D Top-Down Turn-Based Rogue-like game. Where you get on a journey to save your princess. Fighting alone against enemies, with dice. Hence, why he called DICE KNIGHT.

Features:

  • Simple story (No dialogue)
  • Turn-Based combat with card-like system
  • Dice is a key feature of this game
  • Rogue-Like
  • No need to use keyboard to play (Just mouse!)

Controls:

  • Mouse

Credits:

  • “Village of Eternity” by ZNOBEATS (OpenGameArt.org)
  • “Long Way Home” by nene (OpenGameArt.org)
  • “8-Bit Battle Loop” by Wolfgang (OpenGameArt.org)
  • “Theme of the Masked Man” by request (OpenGameArt.org)
